name: TravisAKempf
text: Great service and speedy

name: Arlene Honisko
text: I went in with 6 of my grandbabies. They couldn't have been nicer. The whole place was really clean. I'm a Certified Dietary Manager, so I do look before I eat. Super Clean. We ate outside because it was a beautiful day. They brought our pizzas out with a highchair! Treated us like family. I wish I could give them even more stars!

name: Mandy Girl
text: I tried Marco's just a few years back and always love the taste above all others. Love their new location and being able to sit inside, also they usually have great promotions and deals.

name: Lex Brooks
text: My husband and I have always gotten great pizza the service has always been great as well. Today we got a thin crust pizza we asked for squares when we were on our way to get our pizza my husband got a call that they messed up cutting the …More

name: Haley Miller
text: I had ordered cinnasquares and cheesy bread and my order was delivered 20 minutes before the said time. Along with being delivered early they forgot the frosting for the cinnasquares and the frosting is the very best part. Like that’s not cool bro. But true cheesy bread was good

name: Peter Wise
text: Very good pizza.

name: Marsha Baker
text: Pizza was great. They have no cups..no fountain drinks..and table settings are for small people. We will probably return but will take our pizza to go.

name: R.C. Atv
text: Food is always good. They were swamped the last time, and they still got us good food in a decent time frame.

name: Melanie Stotz
text: The service was great

name: Michelle Thomas
text: Great pizza

name: Anna Grider
text:
Marco's Pizza has relocated, it's in between MacDonald's and Sonic where Tim Horton's used to be.
They have a drive thru, some outdoor seating. My service was fast and friendly. I do like their food and i would eat there again. Inside was clean. Like their breadsticks!

name: Beth Michael
text: From Missouri so I had never had Marco's before. My husband is from the area and use to work there. Me and my kids absolutely love it!

name: cokeycookie
text: Pizza was cold and both my husband and I got sick on it. Never will return.

name: Bronson Ebaugh
text: Always consistent quality pizza.  I've never had a bad pizza here.

name: Jesusa Almaraz
text: I personally cannot understand anyone that eats ANYTHING other than Marco's. I get the same pizza almost every week and it never fails me. They know exactly how I like it and the people there are awesome. I think the one in Bryan, Oh will …More

name: Clark's Crazy Finds & More
text: This place has come a long way, much improved!!!! Great job!

name: B-tay
text: Old world pepperoni..if you didn't know now you do

name: Dana Serio
text: One word to describe this place...YUMMM

name: James Thiel
text: We decided to walk in and order a pizza since it was late and everything else was closed. When we walked in the girl at the counter asked what do you want? I said we would like to order a pizza . She said Ummm no we are closed. I said the …More

name: Roy Cronk
text: Pizza was great. Can not wait for new place get open

name: Marc Gillett
text: The meatball sub was very dry it look like they put the sauce on with a knife the only good thing was when I asked for extra cheese there was extra cheese but no sauce very dry sandwich.

name: Joseph Collins
text: Great food and some of the best service in town

name: monsterbux
text: Usually great tasting pizza but the service is terrible. Called for a delivery n depending whose working depends on if u get delivery.  10:00 call on a week day gets u a " we're closed response ".. …More

name: Brad Washington
text: They make good pizza.

name: Jeremy Mossing
text: I like the food, but you really need to tell your staff not to tell people you're closed on the phone when your hours state you were open for another hour. We called back 2 times and a man finally took our order.

name: Cullen Starry
text: Every time I order here, the pizza I get is not only amazingly good, but any sides I get as well are delicious; a family favorite, I don't see myself turning down a pizza from Marco's ever

name: PRS-ShaaD
text: I guess it depends on what day you order for your food to be good. The last 3 times we ordered it was very gross and we called to talk to the manager and he was very rude if he was even the manager. We just asked why one time we order it is …More

name: mike harman
text: Never had a bad pizza here

name: Mike Sims
text: Good Pizza, terrible service. Staff is extremely rude. Not sure if it is worth going back with such angry people working there!

name: Sheri 80
text: Everything is delicious, just a bit pricey.

name: Audreanna Kates
text: Pizza and salad were awesome! They have good specials as well.

name: Chad Dangler
text: Always high quality and delicious!

name: James Fox Podcast
text: The pizza was perfect! And they had it very quick!

name: John Drinnon
text: Great service. They get it right!

name: JamieLynn Davis
text: Very good service, polite on the phone, and great food!

text: Yummy Marcos!!!!!
